parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language to return some response parameters. Default value: en. Valid values: en, zh, and ja.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: StrategyMode
parameters.description:
The type of the access policy. Valid values:

*   GEO: geographical location-based
*   LATENCY: latency-based
